signature: Observable<Entry<T, S>> search(Func1<? super Geometry, Boolean> condition)

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve checking for intersections with geometric shapes.
Both methods retrieve entries from the R-tree, making them useful for setting up test cases.
Adding entries to the R-tree is a prerequisite for testing the search functionality.

enhanced_by.method_name: delete(Entry<? extends T, ? extends S>, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: Deleting entries can be used to test the search functionality under different tree states.
